author: Justine Coleman
title: Trump golf company tweeted John Daly video suggesting vodka will 'kill this coronavirus'
description: President Trump's golf company tweeted out a video earlier this month in which pro-golfer John Daly suggested that drinking a bottle of vodka a day can "kill this coronavirus."Trump Golf tweeted ...
